alert.note: Alert for Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 7:11PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Vilas County through 815 PM CDT... At 709 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mercer, or 9 miles northeast of Turtle Flambeau Flowage, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lac Du Flambeau, Boulder Junction, Winchester, Border Lakes Natural Area, Rice Creek Natural Area, Arbor Vitae, Woodruff, Presque Isle, Manitowish Waters and Nixon Lake Natural Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
